mil7.2.7:1.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, vaṁso yattha vāto, tattha anulometi, nāññatthamanudhāvati;
mil7.2.7:1.3_1: yoginā yogāvacarena yaṁ buddhena bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ navaṅgaṁ satthusāsanaṁ,
mil7.2.7:1.3_2: taṁ anulomayitvā kappiye anavajje ṭhatvā samaṇadhammaṁyeva pariyesitabbaṁ.
mil7.2.7:1.4_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, vaṁsassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
